padContent:
PHP
case/case_1.php 		HTML
case/case_1.html		 Result
<?php

  $language = 'FR';

?> 		<p>
  &open;case $language&close;
    &open;when 'NL'&close;
      Hallo Wereld
    &open;when 'FR'&close;
      Bonjour le Monde
    &open;when 'DE'&close;
      Hallo Welt
    &open;else&close;
      Hello World
  &open;/case&close;
</p>
PHP
case/case_3.php 		HTML
case/case_3.html		 Result
<?php

  $happiness  = 50;
  $hours      = 2;
  
  $beer       = 10;
  $sausage    = 5;

?> 		<p>
  &open;case $happiness * $hours&close;
    &open;when ($beer*2) + ($sausage*1)&close;
      Bonjour le Monde
    &open;when ($beer*4) + ($sausage*2)&close;
      Hallo Wereld
    &open;when ($beer*8) + ($sausage*4)&close;
      Hallo Welt
    &open;else&close;
      Hello World
  &open;/case&close;
</p>
PHP
case/case_3.php 		HTML
case/case_3.html		 Result
<?php

  $happiness  = 50;
  $hours      = 2;
  
  $beer       = 10;
  $sausage    = 5;

?> 		<p>
  &open;case $happiness * $hours&close;
    &open;when ($beer*2) + ($sausage*1)&close;
      Bonjour le Monde
    &open;when ($beer*4) + ($sausage*2)&close;
      Hallo Wereld
    &open;when ($beer*8) + ($sausage*4)&close;
      Hallo Welt
    &open;else&close;
      Hello World
  &open;/case&close;
</p>
PHP

<p>
  &open;case 100 * 8&close;
    &open;when 700&close;
      nok
    &open;when 900&close;
      nok
    &open;else&close;
      ok
  &open;/case&close;
</p>

    &open;when 600&close;
      &open;case 100 * 8&close;
        &open;when 700&close;
          nok
        &open;when 800&close;
          nok
        &open;else&close;
          nok
      &open;/case&close;
    &open;when 900&close;

        &open;when 700&close;
          nok

          nok
        &open;else&close;
          nok
      &open;/case&close;
    &open;when 800&close;

        &open;when 700&close;
          nok
        &open;when 800&close;
          &open;case 100 * 8&close;
            &open;when 700&close;
              nok

              ok

              nok
          &open;/case&close;
            &open;else&close;
          nok
      &open;/case&close;
    &open;/case&close;
</p>
